scripts.sign:firefox: npm run build:firefox && web-ext sign --api-key $WEB_EXT_API_KEY --api-secret $WEB_EXT_API_SECRET -s dist --channel listed
scripts.run:iceraven: npm run build:firefox && web-ext run -t firefox-android --adb-device $WEB_EXT_ADB_DEVICE --firefox-apk io.github.forkmaintainers.iceraven -s dist
